title: The Innocent Mrs. Duff
description: FIRST PAPERBACK EDITION, Dell Mapback #194, published October 1947. Original hardcover published by Simon & Schuster 1946. Cover art by Gerald Gregg. Ruth Belew crime map on back cover of Jacob Duff's "The Shack at Driftwood Beach/Scene of Murderâ€œ on Shore Road, Driftwood Beach, Horton County (NY or CT); Floor plan of the shack. Original 25 retail price. Paperback, 240 pages, 16 cm.
author: Elisabeth Sanxay Holding
